Title: Provides that the commissioner of labor shall notify the commissioner of taxation and finance of certain violations of the labor law
Summary: Provides that the commissioner of labor shall notify the commissioner of taxation and finance of certain violations of the labor law relating to wages and hours of labor; provides that the commissioner of taxation and finance shall suspend certain certificates of authority of such employers in violation of such provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง219, Lab L; amd ยง1134, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the tax law, in relation to suspending certain certificates of authority of employers who are in violation of certain provisions of the labor law
